items.description: An object that holds all the information for a specific project.
items.title: Project Object

___stars.description: The number of stars a project has on Github, or null if the project is not a Github project.
___stars.title: Project Stars

___license.description: The license that the project's source is under.
___license.title: Project License

___tags.description: A place to put any metadata for a project. The items can be any type.
___tags.title: Project Tags

___category-ids.description: The list of categories that the project falls under. If it is a list, the categories should be ordered from most to least relevant/applicable to the project.
___category-ids.title: Project Category

___suggested_by.description: Name of person who suggested project.
___suggested_by.title: Suggested By

___title.description: The official title of the project.
___title.title: Project Title

___source.description: A URL where the source code to the project can be found.
___source.title: Project Source

___description.description: A brief 1 sentence summary of the project.
___description.title: Project Description

___lang.description: A three-character ISO 639-2 code representing the primary language of the project, or a list of such codes, with the primary language first.
___lang.title: Project Language

___itunes.description: The URL for iTunes page for the project's app.
___itunes.title: Project iTunes Page

___country.description: The country that the project operates out of or the country the project is designed for (if designed for a specific location). Null if country is unclear/unspecified.
___country.title: Project Country

___homepage.description: The URL for the project's homepage.
___homepage.title: Project Homepage

items.description: A category to group project objects under.
items.title: Category Object

___description.description: A description of the category meant to be provided to the user.
___description.title: Category Description

___parent.description: Makes the current category a subcategory of the category with an id that matches this value.
___parent.title: Category Parent

___title.description: A human-readable identifier for the category.
___title.title: Category Title

___id.description: A short identifier designed for programs. It should only contain lowercase alphanumeric characters and a - (dash) for replacing spaces.
___id.title: Category Identifier
